item.title: Susan add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Susan add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I think, The world is actually huge. That's the part no one can really explain." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Susan add a quote by Dana Adam Shapiro
item.description: "It's amazing that someone who knows so much about the human body can know so little about people. I think it's time we laid all our stars out on the table." -- Dana Adam Shapiro

item.title: Susan add a quote by Alfred Tennyson
item.description: "I am a part of all that I have met." -- Alfred Tennyson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "Don't you hear it? She asked & I shook my head no & then she started to dance & suddenly there was music everywhere & it went on for a very long time & when I finally found words all I could say was thank you. " -- Brian Andreas

item.title: Susan add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description: "There was a single blue line of crayon drawn across every wall in the house. What does it mean? I asked. A pirate needs the sight of the sea, he said and then he pulled his eye patch down and turned and sailed away." -- Brian Andreas
